intent_result.merged_query: 查询教师孔航的个人信息
intent_result.rewritten_query: 查询教师孔航的个人信息

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT teacher.teacher_no, teacher.real_name, teacher.gender, teacher.birth_date, teacher.phone, teacher.email, teacher.title, teacher.status FROM teacher WHERE teacher.real_name = '孔航' AND teacher.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.teacher_no, base.real_name, base.gender, base.birth_date, base.phone, base.email, base.title, base.status FROM base
